description.english: Complete your first online race (any discipline)
description.french: Terminez votre première course en ligne (toute discipline)
description.italian: Completa la tua prima gara online (qualsiasi disciplina)
description.spanish: Completa tu primera carrera online (en cualquier disciplina).
description.japanese: いずれかの種目で初めてのオンラインレースをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua sua primeira corrida online (qualquer disciplina).

displayName.japanese: オンラインチャンピオン

description.french: Terminez un championnat en ligne (toute discipline)
description.italian: Completa un campionato online (qualsiasi disciplina)
description.spanish: Completa un campeonato online (en cualquier disciplina).
description.japanese: いずれかの種目で初めてのオンライン選手権をクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua um campeonato online (qualquer disciplina).

displayName.japanese: オンラインエキスパート

description.french: Terminez 25 courses en ligne (toute discipline)
description.italian: Completa 25 gare online (qualsiasi disciplina)
description.spanish: Completa 25 carreras online (en cualquier disciplina).
description.japanese: いずれかの種目でオンラインレースを25回クリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua 25 corridas online (qualquer disciplina).

displayName.japanese: ダートトラックの勝者

description.english: Win a normal Flat Track race
description.french: Remportez une course Flat Track
description.italian: Vinci una gara di Flat Track normale
description.spanish: Gana una carrera normal de Flat Track.
description.japanese: ノーマルのダートトラックレースで勝利する
description.brazilian: Vença uma corrida normal de Flat Track.

description.french: Remportez un Monza Masters' Show
description.italian: Vinci un Monza Masters' Show
description.spanish: Gana un Monza Masters' Show.
description.japanese: Monza Masters' Showで勝利する
description.brazilian: Vença um Monza Masters' Show.

description.english: Win a Special Stage of the Monza Rally Show
description.german: Gewinne eine Special Stage der Monza Rally Show
description.french: Remportez une Special Stage au Monza Rally Show
description.italian: Vinci uno Special Stage del Monza Rally Show
description.spanish: Gana un Special Stage del Monza Rally Show.
description.japanese: Monza Rally Showのスペシャルステージで勝利する
description.brazilian: Vença uma Etapa Especial do Monza Rally Show.

description.french: Remportez une course Flat Track « Americana »
description.italian: Vinci una gara Flat Track "Americana"
description.spanish: Gana una carrera en el Flat Track "Americana".
description.japanese: 「Americana」ダートトラックレースで勝利する
description.brazilian: Vença uma Corrida "Americana" Flat Track.

displayName.english: All for one, R1M for all!
displayName.german: Alle für einen, R1M für alle!
displayName.french: Tous pour un, R1M pour tous !
displayName.italian: Tutti per uno, R1M per tutti!
displayName.japanese: オール・フォー・ワン、R1M・フォー・オール!

description.french: Remportez une course Yamaha R1M
description.italian: Vinci una Gara Yamaha R1M
description.spanish: Gana una carrera de Yamaha R1M.
description.japanese: Yamaha R1Mレースで勝利する
description.brazilian: Vença uma corrida na Yamaha R1M.

description.french: Terminez une course en écran partagé
description.italian: Completa una gara a Schermo Condiviso
description.spanish: Completa una carrera a pantalla dividida.
description.japanese: 画面分割モードのレースをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua uma corrida em tela dividida.

description.english: Beat a track record on any track with a 2016 MotoGP™
description.german: Schlage einen Streckenrekord auf einer beliebigen Strecke mit einem 2016er MotoGP™
description.french: Battez un record du tour sur tout circuit avec une MotoGP™ 2016
description.italian: Batti un record di pista su un qualsiasi tracciato con una MotoGP™ 2016
description.spanish: Supera el récord de cualquier circuito con una MotoGP™ 2016.
description.japanese: 2016 MotoGP™のいずれかのコースでコースレコードを更新する
description.brazilian: Bata um recorde em qualquer pista MotoGP™ de 2016.

description.english: Hold a wheelie for 8 consecutive seconds
description.french: Faites une roue arrière pendant 8 secondes consécutives
description.italian: Mantieni un'impennata per 8 secondi consecutivi
description.spanish: Haz un caballito durante 8 segundos seguidos.
description.japanese: 8秒以上ウィリー走行を続ける
description.brazilian: Mantenha uma empinada por 8 segundos consecutivos.

description.english: Sign the contract to race your first season as an official rider
description.german: Unterzeichne einen Vertrag, um deine erste Saison als offizieller Fahrer anzutreten
description.french: Signez le contrat pour courir votre première saison en tant que pilote officiel
description.italian: Firma il contratto per correre la tua prima stagione da pilota ufficiale
description.spanish: Firma el contrato para disputar tu primera temporada como piloto oficial.
description.japanese: 公式選手として契約を交わし、初めてのレースシーズンに臨む
description.brazilian: Assine um contrato para correr sua primeira temporada como piloto oficial.

description.french: Débloquez votre premier bonus
description.italian: Sblocca il tuo primo Bonus
description.spanish: Desbloquea tu primera bonificación.
description.japanese: 最初のボーナスをアンロックする
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie seu primeiro Bônus.

description.french: Débloquez 15 bonus
description.italian: Sblocca 15 Bonus
description.spanish: Desbloquea 15 bonificaciones.
description.japanese: ボーナスを15個アンロックする
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie 15 Bônus.

description.french: Débloquez tous les bonus
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i Bonus
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las bonificaciones.
description.japanese: すべてのボーナスをアンロックする
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os Bônus.

description.english: Reach the maximum level in one of your rider’s abilities
description.german: Erreiche bei einer deiner Fahrer-Fähigkeiten den höchsten Level
description.french: Montez l'une de vos compétences de pilote au niveau maximum
description.italian: Raggiungi il massimo livello di una delle abilità del tuo pilota
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel máximo en una de tus habilidades de piloto.
description.japanese: ライダーのスキルの1つを最高レベルに到達させる
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível máximo em uma das habilidades do seu piloto.

description.english: Reach the maximum level in all of your rider’s abilities
description.german: Erreiche bei all deinen Fahrer-Fähigkeiten den höchsten Level
description.french: Montez toutes vos compétences de pilote au niveau maximum
description.italian: Raggiungi il massimo livello di tutte le abilità del tuo pilota
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel máximo en todas tus habilidades de piloto.
description.japanese: ライダーの全スキルを最高レベルに到達させる
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível máximo em todas as suas habilidades de piloto.

description.english: Win a MotoGP™, Moto2™ or Moto3™ race using Guided Settings
description.german: Gewinne ein MotoGP™-, Moto2™- oder Moto3™-Rennen mit angeleiteten Einstellungen
description.french: Remportez une course MotoGP™, Moto2™ ou Moto3™ grâce au Guide des réglages
description.italian: Vinci una gara MotoGP™, Moto2™ o Moto3™ usando la messa a punto guidata
description.spanish: Gana una carrera de MotoGP™, Moto2™ o Moto3™ usando los ajustes guiados
description.japanese: ガイド付きセッティングでMotoGP™、Moto2™、またはMoto3™のレースで勝利する
description.brazilian: Vença uma corrida na MotoGP™, Moto2™ ou Moto3™ usando ajuste assistido.

displayName.japanese: ポールポジション・スタート

description.english: Gain pole position in a MotoGP™, Moto2™ or Moto3™ race.
description.german: Hole bei einem MotoGP™-, Moto2™- oder Moto3™-Rennen die Poleposition

description.spanish: Consigue una pole en una carrera de MotoGP™, Moto2™ o Moto3™.
description.japanese: MotoGP™、Moto2™またはMoto3™のレースでポールポジションを獲得する
description.brazilian: Ganhe a pole position em uma corrida na MotoGP™, Moto2™ ou Moto3™.

description.english: Win a MotoGP™ race with PRO physics, tyre wear and damages activated
description.german: Gewinne ein Rennen mit Pro-Fahrphysik, Reifenabnutzung und aktiviertem Schaden

description.spanish: Gana una carrera de MotoGP™ con físicas Pro, desgaste de neumáticos y daños activos.

description.english: Become world champion in Career mode (any category)

description.english: Race a total of 250 km - 155 miles with a Flat Track bike
description.german: Fahre insgesamt 250 km (155 Meilen) mit einem Flat-Track-Motorrad
description.french: Courez 250 km (155 miles) au total avec une moto Flat Track
description.italian: Percorri un totale di 250 Km - 155 mi con moto da Flat Track
description.spanish: Recorre un total de 250 km / 155 millas con una moto de Flat Track.
description.japanese: ダートトラック・マシンのレースで合計250km(155マイル)走行する
description.brazilian: Corra um total de 250 km (155 milhas) com uma moto Flat Track.

description.english: Race a total of 250 km - 155 miles with a Rally car
description.german: Fahre insgesamt 250 km (155 Meilen) mit einem Rallye-Wagen

description.spanish: Recorre un total de 250 km / 155 millas con un coche de rally.
description.japanese: ラリーカーのレースで合計250km(155マイル)走行する

description.english: Race a total of 500 km - 311 miles on a MotoGP™, Moto2™ or Moto3™ bike.
description.german: Fahre insgesamt 500 km (311 Meilen) mit einem MotoGP™-, Moto2™- oder Moto3™-Motorrad.
description.french: Courez 500 km (311 miles) au total avec une moto MotoGP™, Moto2™ ou Moto3™
description.italian: Percorri un totale di 500 Km - 311 mi a bordo di una MotoGP™, Moto2™ o Moto3™
description.spanish: Recorre un total de 500 km / 311 millas con una moto de MotoGP™, Moto2™ o Moto3™.
description.japanese: MotoGP™、Moto2™またはMoto3™のマシンに乗ってレースで合計500km(311マイル)走行する
description.brazilian: Corra um total de 500 km (311 milhas) com uma moto MotoGP™, Moto2™ ou Moto3™.
